salesforce-2.title: Get Existing PB Entry
salesforce-2.description: Search the Entry for the product

q.value:
SELECT i.id, cur.symbol, i.fullName, pt.fromval, pt.value, CASE WHEN pt.pricingOption=-102 THEN 'Fixed Amount' ELSE 'Rate' END priceOption
FROM priceBook pb
JOIN priceBookLineInterval  pbi ON pbi.priceBook=pb.id
JOIN item i ON i.id=pbi.item
JOIN pricePlan pp ON pp.id=pbi.pricePlan
JOIN priceTiers pt ON pt.pricePlan=pp.id
JOIN currency cur ON cur.id=pb.currency
WHERE pb.id= {$.steps.loop-4.value.id}
